questions.question: Tell me about yourself and your journey in Java development so far.
What are the main features of Java that make it platform-independent and secure?
Explain the four main pillars of Object-Oriented Programming with examples.
What is the difference between method overloading and method overriding?
What is the difference between abstract class and interface in Java?
What is encapsulation? How does Java achieve it?
What are the main differences between ArrayList and LinkedList?
Explain the difference between HashMap and TreeMap.
How does Java’s HashMap internally work?
What is the difference between checked and unchecked exceptions?
What is the use of the finally block in exception handling?
Explain Garbage Collection in Java. How can it be requested programmatically?
What are the two ways to create a thread in Java? Which one is preferred and why?
Explain the concept of synchronization in Java and how it prevents data inconsistency.
What is the difference between JDK, JRE, and JVM?
Write a simple Java program to check if a given number is a prime number.
Tell me about yourself and your journey in JavaScript development so far.
What are the main features of JavaScript that make it a versatile language?
Explain the difference between var, let, and const in JavaScript.
What is hoisting in JavaScript?
What are arrow functions and how are they different from regular functions?
Explain the concept of closures in JavaScript with an example.
What is the difference between == and === in JavaScript?
What are promises and async/await in JavaScript?
Explain event bubbling and event capturing in JavaScript.
What is the difference between synchronous and asynchronous programming?
What is the use of the 'this' keyword in JavaScript?
What is the difference between deep copy and shallow copy in JavaScript?
Explain the concept of prototypal inheritance in JavaScript.
What is the purpose of JavaScript modules (import/export)?
What is the use of setTimeout and setInterval functions?
Write a JavaScript program to find the factorial of a number.
Tell me about yourself and your journey in Frontend development so far.
What are the main differences between HTML, CSS, and JavaScript?
Explain the concept of the Document Object Model (DOM).
What are semantic HTML elements and why are they important?
Explain the difference between inline, internal, and external CSS.
What is the difference between Flexbox and CSS Grid?
What are media queries and how do they help in responsive design?
Explain the concept of the box model in CSS.
What is the difference between relative, absolute, and fixed positioning in CSS?
What is React.js and why is it widely used for frontend development?
Explain the difference between functional and class components in React.
What are React hooks? Give examples of commonly used hooks.
What is the purpose of the Virtual DOM in React?
What is state and props in React, and how do they differ?
What is the difference between SPA (Single Page Application) and MPA?
Write a simple React component that displays a list of items.
Tell me about yourself and your journey in .NET development so far.
What is the .NET Framework and how does it work?
What are the main differences between .NET Framework, .NET Core, and .NET 5/6?
What is the Common Language Runtime (CLR)?
Explain the concept of managed and unmanaged code in .NET.
What is the difference between value types and reference types in C#?
What are constructors and destructors in C#?
What is the difference between abstract classes and interfaces in C#?
What is the purpose of the 'using' statement in C#?
Explain exception handling in C# with try, catch, and finally.
What is the difference between IEnumerable and ICollection?
What is LINQ in C# and why is it used?
What is Entity Framework and how does it simplify database operations?
What are delegates and events in C#?
What is ASP.NET MVC and how does it differ from ASP.NET Core?
Write a C# program to check whether a number is even or odd.
Tell me about yourself and your journey in Java development so far.
What are the key features of Java that make it platform-independent?
Explain the concept of Object-Oriented Programming in Java with examples.
What is the difference between method overloading and method overriding?
What are interfaces in Java and how are they different from abstract classes?
Explain encapsulation and its benefits in Java applications.
What is the difference between ArrayList, LinkedList, and Vector?
How does Java handle memory management and garbage collection?
Explain the working of HashMap in Java and how collisions are handled.
What is the difference between checked and unchecked exceptions in Java?
What are threads in Java? How do you create and manage them?
Explain synchronization in Java and why it’s needed in multithreaded programs.
What is the difference between JDK, JRE, and JVM?
What are lambda expressions in Java? Give an example.
Explain the use of Stream API in Java 8 with an example.
Write a Java program to reverse a string without using built-in functions.
Tell me about yourself and your journey in JavaScript development so far.
Explain the concept of hoisting in JavaScript.
What is the difference between let, const, and var?
What are closures in JavaScript?
What are promises and how do they differ from callbacks?
What is the difference between synchronous and asynchronous programming?
What are template literals and when should they be used?
Explain destructuring assignment in JavaScript.
What are ES6 modules and why are they important?
What is the difference between deep copy and shallow copy in JavaScript?
Explain the concept of event loop in JavaScript.
What is async/await and how does it simplify asynchronous code?
What are higher-order functions in JavaScript?
Explain the purpose of arrow functions in ES6.
What are generators in JavaScript?
Write a program to check if a string is a palindrome in JavaScript.
Tell me about yourself and your journey in cloud computing so far.
What is cloud computing and what are its main service models?
Explain the difference between IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS with examples.
What are public, private, and hybrid cloud models?
What is virtualization and why is it important in cloud computing?
What are containers and how do they differ from virtual machines?
Explain what AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud are used for.
What is auto-scaling and how does it help in cloud cost optimization?
Explain the concept of serverless computing.
What are IAM roles and policies in cloud environments?
What is load balancing in cloud infrastructure?
Explain the concept of cloud storage and its types.
What are some best practices for securing cloud-based applications?
What is the shared responsibility model in cloud security?
Explain how CI/CD pipelines are integrated into cloud environments.
What is Kubernetes and why is it used for container orchestration?
Tell me about yourself and your experience in Artificial Intelligence.
What are the main branches of AI?
What is the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?
Explain the concept of machine learning and its real-world applications.
What is deep learning and how does it differ from traditional ML?
What are neural networks and how do they work?
Explain overfitting and underfitting in ML models.
What are activation functions in neural networks?
What is natural language processing (NLP)?
What is computer vision and where is it used?
Explain the concept of reinforcement learning with an example.
What are confusion matrices and precision-recall in ML?
What is the difference between AI, ML, and DL?
What are some common Python libraries used for AI?
Explain transfer learning in AI.
Write a Python function that predicts output from a trained AI model.

What are the key differences between HTML, CSS, and JavaScript?
What are semantic HTML elements and why are they important for accessibility?
Explain how the DOM works and how JavaScript interacts with it.

What is the Virtual DOM in React?

What is the difference between server-side rendering (SSR) and client-side rendering (CSR)?
What are web components and why are they useful?
What are Progressive Web Apps (PWA) and their benefits?
How do you ensure accessibility (a11y) in your frontend projects?
Explain the concept of responsive design and mobile-first development.
Write a React component that fetches data from an API and displays it.
Tell me about yourself and your journey as a backend developer so far.

Explain RESTful APIs and how they work.
What are HTTP methods and their purposes?

What is caching and how does it improve performance?
